```{r}
install.packages("palmerpenguins")

#pull the library
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)

#look at the data
view(penguins)
head(penguins)
tail(penguins)
glimpse(penguins)

#create a ggplot
ggplot(data = penguins,
       mapping = aes(x = bill_depth_mm, y = bill_length_mm, color = species)) + #ecerytime adding a layer, then use +
  geom_point()



```
